Package org.spotify.db.dao

Class PerformerDAO

java.lang.Object
org.spotify.db.dao.PerformerDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<Performer>
public class PerformerDAO extends Object implements Repository<Performer>
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on Performer entities.

The PerformerDAO class is responsible for interacting with the database to perform create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) operations for Performer objects using Hibernate ORM.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Constructor Details

    • PerformerDAO

      public PerformerDAO()
      Constructs a PerformerDAO using the HibernateUtil to get the session factory.

      This constructor initializes the session factory to be used for database interactions.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save(Performer performer)
      Saves a new Performer entity to the database.

      This method begins a transaction, saves the provided performer, and commits the transaction. If an error occurs, the transaction is rolled back, and an exception is thrown.

      Specified by:
      save in interface Repository<Performer>
      Parameters:
      performer - the Performer to be saved
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the save operation

    • findById

      public Performer findById(Long id)
      Finds and returns a Performer by its ID from the database.

      This method begins a transaction, retrieves the performer by ID, initializes its associated MusicCollection and Song objects, and commits the transaction. If an error occurs, an exception is thrown.

      Specified by:
      findById in interface Repository<Performer>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Performer to be found
      Returns:
      the Performer object with the specified ID, or null if not found
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the find operation

    • findAll

      public List<Performer> findAll()
      Finds and returns all Performer entities from the database.

      This method begins a transaction, retrieves all performers, initializes their associated MusicCollection and Song objects, and commits the transaction. If an error occurs, an exception is thrown.

      Specified by:
      findAll in interface Repository<Performer>
      Returns:
      a list of all Performer objects
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the find operation

    • delete

      public void delete(Performer performer)
      Deletes a Performer from the database.

      This method begins a transaction, deletes the provided performer, and commits the transaction. If an error occurs, the transaction is rolled back, and an exception is thrown.

      Specified by:
      delete in interface Repository<Performer>
      Parameters:
      performer - the Performer to be deleted
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the delete operation

    • update

      public void update(Performer performer)
      Updates an existing Performer entity in the database.

      This method begins a transaction, updates the provided performer, and commits the transaction. If an error occurs, the transaction is rolled back, and an exception is thrown.

      Specified by:
      update in interface Repository<Performer>
      Parameters:
      performer - the Performer to be updated
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the update operation
